name: Word List
desc: Memorize a list of words and recall them in correct order.

name: Word Pairs
desc: Memorize associations between pairs of words.

name: Word-Number Pairs
desc: Link words with specific numbers for recall.

name: Quick Recall
desc: Memorize a short number and repeat it forward or backward.

name: Long Number
desc: Memorize a lengthy sequence of digits.

name: Number List
desc: Memorize a list of numbers and recall them in order.

name: Mental Math
desc: Perform quick mental calculations under pressure.

name: Random Word
desc: Memorize a random sequence of letters.

name: Secure Code
desc: Memorize a random mix of letters and numbers.

name: Reverse Word
desc: Read a word and recall its letters in reverse order.

name: Word Scramble
desc: Read a reversed word and recall it in correct order.

name: Arrow Maze
desc: Identify the direction of an arrow at a specific position.

name: Shape Finder
desc: Identify a geometric shape at a given position.

name: Flight Hub
desc: Memorize flight details including airline, gate, and city.

name: Tokyo Metro
desc: Recall stations and times from a Tokyo itinerary.

name: Agenda Master
desc: Memorize a schedule of various appointments.

name: Anagrams
desc: Reorder scrambled letters into a valid word.

name: Pattern Logic
desc: Identify the next number in a logical sequence.

name: METAR Decoder
desc: Memorize aviation weather reports.

name: Tower Comms
desc: Memorize ATC instructions for takeoff and landing.

name: Flight Plan
desc: Memorize a sequence of navigation waypoints and altitudes.

name: Road Trip
desc: Recall directions and distances from a road itinerary.

name: Time Tracker
desc: Calculate durations between start and end times.

name: Lab Assistant
desc: Memorize chemical formulas and their symbols.
